question_7: What is a full shade plant?
answer_7: Full shade basically means that the shade lasts all day long. Very little, if any, direct sunlight hits the plant at any time of the day. ... question_9: Can plants grow in extreme heat?
answer_9: Germination increases in higher temperatures – up to a point. Once the seeds reach optimum temperatures, which depends on the plant, germination begins to decline. ... So whether it's extreme heat or cold, temperature does affect plants and their growth.Apr 21, 2021
